title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
With Colin off, Joy Taylor steps in to discuss the NBA Finals and if Boston's Jayson Tatum should be considered a legitimate "#1" in today's NBA. She believes it's time for the NFL to step in and suspend Deshaun Watson for the entire season as more lawsuits are expected to come. She also explains why the Cardinals need to step up and pay up for QB Kyler Murray before training camp. Plus, Nick Wright from First Things First defends Tatum's status a member of the NBA superstar club. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
With Colin off, Joy Taylor steps in to discuss the NBA Finals and if Boston's Jayson Tatum should be considered a legitimate "#1" in today's NBA. She believes it's time for the NFL to step in and suspend Deshaun Watson for the entire season as more lawsuits are expected to come. She also explains why the Cardinals need to step up and pay up for QB Kyler Murray before training camp. Plus, Nick Wright from First Things First defends Tatum's status a member of the NBA superstar club.
